Lipi Lekhika running in background.

menu_values.startup: Open This Window on App Startup

sahAyikA_msg.first_sahayika:
Press or Click Characters in black for their corresponding akshara.
Press ; or q to reset or to remove continuations.
sahAyikA_msg.second_sahayika: Shift can also be used in place of CapsLock.For eg: Shift+a➠A

time_exceed:
Lipi Lekhika Turned off
As It was Left idle for 10 minutes.

title.background: Use in background through Taskbar and keyboard shortcuts
title.github:
Lipi Lekhika is Open Source Software whose source code can be read on GitHub.
Click Here to go to that page.
title.usage: View Usage Table and Other Instructions

values.app_description:
This is an Application to type Indian Langugaes with Full Speed and Accuracy.
For More Related Information visit lipilekhika.pages.dev.
values.instructions:
• Windows+Ctrl :-To turn On/Off
• .(dot) :- To type numbers, vowels or special symbols 
• Alt for 1 second :- To see current selected options.
• Lekhan Sahayika will be at cursor(of mouse) position.
values.nirdesh:
• Shift+F2 :-To Start Lipi Lekhika Directly  &  • Windows+Esc :- To Close Appliaction
• Lekhan Sahayika will be displed at current mouse cursor position.
• You can set Default Option for Application in menu, for eg- default typing language.
• Windows+F5 : To Decrease Volume & Windows+F6 : To Increase Volume
values.sUchI_msg:
There are more alternatives for typing the aksharas below.
Make sure to Turn On the Lekhan Sahayika to learn more.
values.vishisht_label:
This is the Advanced Version of Lipi Lekhika.
It may contain Edited Data.
